argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | recexpr.1 | |- B = <. { x | E. y ( x <Q y /\ ( *Q ` y ) e. ( 2nd ` A ) ) } , { x | E. y ( y <Q x /\ ( *Q ` y ) e. ( 1st ` A ) ) } >. |
| 2 |  | #P_ltsonq | |- <Q Or Q. |
| 3 |  | #P_ltrelnq | |- <Q C_ ( Q. X. Q. ) |
| 4 | 2, 3 | #P_sotri | |- ( ( q <Q r /\ r <Q y ) -> q <Q y ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_ex | |- ( q <Q r -> ( r <Q y -> q <Q y ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_anim1d | |- ( q <Q r -> ( ( r <Q y /\ ( *Q ` y ) e. ( 2nd ` A ) ) -> ( q <Q y /\ ( *Q ` y ) e. ( 2nd ` A ) ) ) ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_eximdv | |- ( q <Q r -> ( E. y ( r <Q y /\ ( *Q ` y ) e. ( 2nd ` A ) ) -> E. y ( q <Q y /\ ( *Q ` y ) e. ( 2nd ` A ) ) ) ) |
| 8 | 1 | #P_recexprlemell | |- ( r e. ( 1st ` B ) <-> E. y ( r <Q y /\ ( *Q ` y ) e. ( 2nd ` A ) ) ) |
| 9 | 1 | #P_recexprlemell | |- ( q e. ( 1st ` B ) <-> E. y ( q <Q y /\ ( *Q ` y ) e. ( 2nd ` A ) ) ) |
| 10 | 7, 8, 9 | #P_3imtr4g | |- ( q <Q r -> ( r e. ( 1st ` B ) -> q e. ( 1st ` B ) ) ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_imp | |- ( ( q <Q r /\ r e. ( 1st ` B ) ) -> q e. ( 1st ` B ) ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_rexlimivw | |- ( E. r e. Q. ( q <Q r /\ r e. ( 1st ` B ) ) -> q e. ( 1st ` B ) ) |
| 13 | 12 | #P_a1i | |- ( ( A e. P. /\ q e. Q. ) -> ( E. r e. Q. ( q <Q r /\ r e. ( 1st ` B ) ) -> q e. ( 1st ` B ) ) ) |
